details: Has applied for a Common Victualler License to be exercised on the above - 1,022 SF Located on the ground level. It includes a service counter, kitchen, and storage area. The setup is sit-down with takeout, with seating for 21. There is one bathroom and two exits.

Has applied for a Common Victualler License to be exercised on the above -1,200SF Cafe shop that consists of two rooms totaling. The front room is used for serving tea and coffee, while the rear room is designated for storage and includes a half restroom. The cafe is located on the first floor and has seating for up to 16 people.

Has applied for a Common Victualler License to be exercised on the above -800SF Take-out only tea shop (beverage store). The first floor includes a small food preparation area and a pickup counter at the front. There is an additional small prep area in the back, along with an employee-only bathroom.

status_detail: Granted, with closing time of 10:00 PM and Jason Tucker as Manager of Record
details: Has applied for a Common Victualler License to be exercised on the above -875SF First-floor unit. The space includes a kitchen and storage area located in the rear. There are four rooms total, including a restroom. The business will operate as a fish market and seafood takeout with a maximum of 18 seats. The bathroom will be shared by both guests and staff. Manager:  Michael Bullock Hours of Operation:  8:00 AM to 12:00 AM

Has applied for a license to operate two (2) Bowling Lanes on the above premises - Premise A.K.A. 327 A Street Boston MA 02210, The premise consists of - (14,219 SF) In one room on lower level with reception area, six golf simulators, seating areas and bar, kitchen, storage rooms, restrooms and office space, and two duckpin bowling lanes; in one additional room on first floor with an additional seven golf simulators, seating areas and bar, storage, and restrooms; together with seasonal (April-November) outdoor patio on private property with seating for 24 patrons. 1:00 AM Indoor Closing Hour; 10:00 PM Outdoor Closing Hour.
Holder of a Club All-Alcoholic Beverages license has petitioned to change the manager of the licensed business - From: Meredith M. Waites To: Robert Williams.

Holder of a Common Victualler 7 Day All-Alcoholic Beverages License has petitioned for a change of LLC Manager. Secondly, has petitioned to change the manager of the licensed business - From: James Driscoll To: Joseph Ghanem.
Holder of a Common Victuallar 7 Day All-Alcoholic Beverages License has petitioned to pledge the license to Merrimack Valley Credit Union.
Holder of an Innholder All-Alcoholic Beverages License has petitioned for the approval of a Management Agreement between Seaport Hotel Limited Partnership and CTH Mayflower, LLC.

business_name: Shack Foods of Back Bay, LLC
details: Holder of a Common Victualler 7 Day All-Alcoholic Beverages License has petitioned to transfer the license from the above - To: El Barco BackBay, LLC dba El Barco (at the same location). Amanda Allen, Manager. 1:00 AM Closing Hour. Updating the description of premise as follows: In one large room on ground floor with various dining areas with seating for 140 patrons, additional counter seating for 17, and bar with seating for 23, office, storage, restroom and kitchen located in rear. All together comprised of approximately 6,000 sf with 1 entrance and 2 exits.

Holder of a Common Victualler 7 Day All-Alcoholic Beverages License has petitioned to transfer the license from the above - To: Gomes Enterprises, Inc. dba Cantina Italiana (at the same location). Jenna DeLuccia, Manager. 1:00 AM Closing Hour. Secondly, has petitioned to pledge the license and inventory to Eastern Bank.

status_detail: Deferred to allow for completion of the community process
details: Holder of a Common Victualler 7 Day Wines and Malt Beverages License has petitioned to transfer the license from the above - To: Oda Bar & Bites, Inc. dba Oda Bar & Bites (at the same location). Ergys Struga, Manager. 11:00 PM Closing Hour. Updating the description of premise as follows: 700SF full-service restaurant featuring a fully equipped kitchen and indoor dining and bathroom with accommodations for up to 17 guests indoors. The total capacity expands to 57 with the Front (10 Seats) & Rear (30 Seats) seasonal patios (April-Oct) on private property from 6:00 AM to 4:00 PM. The restaurant has 3 entrances and 3 exits.

Holder of a Common Victualler 7 Day Wines and Malt Beverages with Liqueurs License has petitioned to transfer the license and the location - From: F.P. Restaurant Inc. located at 288 Hanover Street, Boston, MA 02113. To: Gen Allston LP dba Gen Korean BBQ House located at 121 Harvard Ave, Allston, MA 02134. The restaurant is composed of two floors and a basement and is a total of 7,385 square feet. The first floor has a main entrance that opens onto Harvard Ave., elevator to the right of the entrance, an exit in the back next to the stairs, kitchen area and station service in the back right, dining area with 86 seats located centrally, restrooms in the back left. The second floor has a dining area with 132 seats, and a service station on the right side. Basement is for storage. (1 entrance/2 exits). Joy Kim, Manager. Closing Hours: 11:00 PM Sun-Thur, 1:00 AM Fri-Sat.

Has applied for a 19C Farmer Brewery Pouring License to be exercised on the above -The brewery is in the basement and the tasting room on the 1st floor of a 4-story brick building. The 1st floor has a taproom area (3120 sq.ft). The production and storage area of the brewery is 422 square feet. The total sq.ft is 3,542. The basement has no external doors or windows and has a single hatch door which leads to the tasting room.

Has applied for a 19B Farmer Winery Pouring License to be exercised on the above - The winery is in the basement and the tasting room on the 1st floor of a 4-story brick building. The 1st floor has a taproom area (3120 sq.ft). The production and storage area of winery is 92 sq.ft. The total sq.ft of the winery and taproom is 142 sq.ft. The basement has no external doors or windows and has a single hatch door which leads to the tasting room.

Has applied for a Common Victualler 7 Day All-Alcoholic Beverages License to be exercised on the above  8,000 SF full service restaurant, 2 floors, 2 entrances and 6 exits. The first floor consists of a dining room, bar with seating for 143 and 20 standing, wine room and bev. station. The lower level consists of a dining room, kitchen, storage, restrooms, service bar with seating for 40. Also a 3100 SF year-round patio on private property with a dining area and bar capacity of 234 with a closing time of 1 a.m.

address: 1010 William T Morrissey Blvd, Dorchester, MA 02122
details: Has applied for a Common Victualler 7 Day All-Alcoholic Beverages License to be exercised on the above - 2,732 SF on one floor ground level with 2 entrances & 3 exits. Walk-in freezer, cooler, and dry storage in the rear. One prep room with cooking equipment abutted by dishwashing room. The next area consists of kitchen with hot and cold line and small office . This is separated from the main dining area by a 10-seat kitchen counter. Two bathrooms to the left. Main dining room takes up the remaining space with fixed booths and loose tables and chairs.

Has applied for a Common Victualler 7 Day All-Alcoholic Beverages License to be exercised on the above -2500 square foot restaurant on first floor with 1 entrance and 3 exits. Includes dining area in the front of space with seating for approximately 105, kitchen and restrooms in the rear. (2000SF) Basement for storage and food preparation only. Manager:  William Jian Min Huang Closing Time:  12:00 AM
